Bow.Description: Sturdy shortbow capable of firing standard arrows.

Cannonball.Description: Thick, heavy ball made of solid lead.

Potion.Description: Glass flask filled with a murky red liquid. Heals six hearts on use.

Tiny Gear.Description: A small, metallic gear. Its teeth are irregularly shaped.
Tiny Gear.Spoiler: Opens a path to the upper floors of the Windmill.

Twinblade.Description: Imposing double-ended blade with a wrapped grip in the center.
